column1: Smoque BBQ////So what's holding them back?  A sad absence of pickles
column2: onions and potato salad.  Then again
column3: the owner (manager?) said it's perfectly fine to bring my own jar of pickles next time
column4: so bonus points for Smoque.  I'm serious about the potato salad
column5: though - a Texas BBQ dinner just isn't complete without it!
